metadata.title: The Dark Secrets Of Raghav Juyal - Cinemastic
metadata.description:
Raghav Juyal, famously known as the King of Slow Motion, is one of India’s most unique dancers and entertainers. From starting his journey in Dance India Dance 3 to becoming a household name with Dance Plus and later transitioning into Bollywood films like ABCD 2 and Street Dancer 3D, his story is truly inspiring.

In this video, we’ll explore:
 • His early life and how he developed the “slow motion” style
 • Breakthrough in Dance India Dance and massive fan following
 • Hosting & judging realit
